name: The Forgotten Village of Gondomayit
description:
The Forgotten Village of Gondomayit allows you to experience the mystical atmosphere of Indonesia.
Tells the story of a girl named Kinan who has just been assigned out of town to carry out her duties as a new civil servant.
However, there were many strange incidents when they just arrived at the village. Starting from a scary and quiet atmosphere,
the appearance of strange creatures and much more
And this game is also very interactive because there are missions that must be solved, starting from looking for clues as to why this beautiful village is so haunted, consulting with residents, looking for clues at the shaman's house, to finding clues at the public cemetery.
Designed and developed from the ground up for fully immersive atmosphere and gameplay,
The Forgotten village of gondomayit is our approach to a truly unsettling and terrifying experience.
